items.title: Apple (AAPL) $240 PT, Buy — Citi Sees Tariff Boost Now, AI Risks Later
items.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is a Must-Watch AI Stock on Wall Street. On July 11, Citi analyst Atif Malik reiterated the stock as “Buy” with a $240.00 price target. The firm said it sees some uncertainty for Apple but that it’s sticking with its buy rating. Adjusting its iPhone unit sales forecast, the investment bank now anticipates […]

items.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Slides as Market Rises: Facts to Know Before You Trade
items.description: Apple (AAPL) reached $208.62 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -1.2% change compared to its last close.

items.title: ETFs to Play on AI's Growing Momentum
items.description: NVDA's surge past a $4T market cap spotlights AI's explosive growth and the ETFs riding this tech-fueled momentum.

items.title: Apple Not Rushing To Follow Samsung With Folding-Screen iPhone
items.description: Apple is aiming to release its first folding-screen iPhone in late 2026, a Wall Street stock analyst says.

items.title: Apple’s first foldable phone is set for 2026 and UBS thinks it may be as cheap as $1,800. Here’s what else to know
items.description: Initial production is expected to be limited, with estimates ranging from 10 million to 15 million units for the first wave.
